Package org.dotplot.core

Provides the core of the dotplot-system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IConfiguration This interface serves as supertype of all configurations used in the dotplot system.
IConfigurationRegistry A Registry for Configurations.
IGuiService A gui-interface for displaying messages.
IInterceptor An Interceptor intercepts Service-events.
IPlotSource Interface for representing plot sources.
ISourceList Interface for a list of PlotSources.
ISourceType Supertype for all SourceTypes.
ITypeBindingRegistry A Registry to bind types to file endings.
ITypeRegistry A registry for SourceTypes.
 

Class Summary
BaseType Default implementation of the interface ISourceType.
ConfigurationRegistry Instances of this class serves as registries for IConfiguration objects.
ContextFactory This class handles the creation of the DotplotContext of the system.
DefaultSourceList Defaultimplementation of the ISourceList interface.
DotplotContext Instances of this class serves as frameworkcontext of the dotplot system.
DotplotFile Instances serves as IPlotSource representation of standard files.
DotplotService This class serves as superclass of all Services of the dotplot system.
ImagerJob Creates a new Dotplot based on the current TypeTabele.
PlotterJob A Job for creating dotplots.
StorePreferencesJob This Job storres the Configurations of the DotplotContext in the Eclipse-preferences.
TypeBindingRegistry A defaultimplementation of the ITypeBindingRegistry interface.
TypeRegistry A registry for ISourceTypes.
UsePreferenceJob This Job collects information stored in the eclipse-preferences and uses them on the dotplot - system.
 

Package org.dotplot.core Description

Provides the core of the dotplot-system.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • www.dotplot.org

Since:
1.0
